#summary Gallery and Scripts

= Introduction =

This is a gallery of Top Draw Scripts.

== [http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Scripts/Apple.tds Apple.tds] ==
http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/Apple1.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/Apple2.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/Apple3.jpeg

Apple logo with drop shadow and some rotating apples.  Shows text (apples are unicode characters) and rotations.

== [http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Scripts/CheckerFilter.tds CheckerFilter.tds] ==
http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/CheckerFilter1.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/CheckerFilter2.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/CheckerFilter3.jpeg

A blurry checkerboard of varying square size and colors.  Shows how to chain Core Image filters.

== [http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Scripts/ColoredRect.tds ColoredRect.tds] ==
http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/ColoredRect1.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/ColoredRect2.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/ColoredRect3.jpeg

Smooth interpolation across all four corners.  Very simple.

== [http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Scripts/ColoredRect+Time.tds ColoredRect+Time.tds] ==
http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/ColoredRect+Time1.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/ColoredRect+Time2.jpeg http://topdraw.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Gallery/ColoredRect+Time3.jpeg

Smooth interpolation across all four corners and the time displayed in the lower right corner.  The time drawing can be copied and pasted into any script.
